titleStmt.title: Correspondence of strategos about irrigation problems
titleStmt.author: Unknown

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: NN, strategos of the leontopolite nome through NN basilikos grammateus acting as strategos to NN, strategos of Bousirites my loving friend, greetings. ... and before I have declared to ... and now, my brother I am writing that the fields in the Leontopolites never were inundated. You can see that ... you inspect ...

listBibl.bibl: D'Hautcourt A, PBingen, 463-468, no 114, 2000, Pl. 69 -- On the back at its right edge a long and a short stroke parallel each other. Above and below the big hole in the middle of the papyrus there traces of ink. It looks like the place where the papyrus seal was (NL);;;In l. 7 a typing mistake in "oti": instead of the grave accent to "iota", acute to "omicron" (NL)
